section.name: What is Hippo Site Toolkit 2?
section.p: Hippo ECM comes with a set of tools and components to allow rapid development of websites, the Hippo Site Toolkit 2.

Hippo Site Toolkit 2 is an open source toolkit for Java web developers, to build websites based on sitename changeHippo CMS 7. Assemble your website by configuring templates, site map, navigation and URL space through a straightforward user interface, that integrates with Hippo CMS. Create a JSP based view layer using the provided tag library and expression language.
